(static) REQUEST_STATUS :object

CDM request status enum for request status events.
Type:
  • object
Properties:
Name Type Description
SUCCESS string Success event for request
FAILURE string Failure event for request
DOWNLOADING string Successful download start event for request
Source:
  • apis/hikeCdm.js, line 72

Methods

(static) downloadAssetsForMolecule(moleculeId, atomIds)

CDM API to Download assets from Asset Management system for a Molecule. Refer https://hikeapp.atlassian.net/wiki/display/EN/Scoopwhoop+Tech+Doc for terminology. Fires a moleculeDownloaded on NativeEventEmitter with moleculeId as a parameter.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
moleculeId string Molecule Id is important since when native emits a "moleculeDownloaded" event, moleculeId would be its first parameter to identify which download call has been resolved.
atomIds Array.string Array of atom id strings where atoms constitute a molecule. For ex: two images present in a story qualify as atoms.
Source:
  • apis/hikeCdm.js, line 23

(static) getAssetFileExtension(assetArray)

Call this method to get extension of list of assets
Parameters:
Name Type Description
assetArray not null
Source:
  • apis/hikeCdm.js, line 59

(static) getDownloadAssetsDirectory() → {Promise.String}

CDM API used by a microapp to get directory path for the assets that are downloaded via CDM. Required to refer to the image/video asset by absolute path for displaying/playing purpose.
Source:
  • apis/hikeCdm.js, line 38
Returns:
Promise is resolved with string path to the downloaded assets directory.
Type
Promise.String

(static) getDownloadedMolecules() → {Promise.Array}

CDM API used by a Microapp on open to get a list of downloaded stories
Source:
  • apis/hikeCdm.js, line 30
Returns:
Promise is resolved with array of stories completely downloaded.
Type
Promise.Array
